name: trusted-agentic-commerce-protocol
description: TypeScript SDK implementing the Trusted Agentic Commerce Protocol for secure authentication and data encryption between AI agents, merchants and merchant vendors.

scripts.test:crypto: npm run build && node dist/tests/test-runner.js crypto
scripts.test:cache: npm run build && node dist/tests/test-runner.js cache
scripts.test:network: npm run build && node dist/tests/test-runner.js network
scripts.test:sender: npm run build && node dist/tests/test-runner.js sender
scripts.test:recipient: npm run build && node dist/tests/test-runner.js recipient
scripts.test:errors: npm run build && node dist/tests/test-runner.js errors
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && node dist/tests/test-runner.js integration
scripts.test:utils: npm run build && node dist/tests/test-runner.js utils
scripts.test:list: npm run build && node dist/tests/test-runner.js list
scripts.fix: npm run format && npm run lint:fix

author: Forter (https://www.forter.com)
